TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CookieHandlerMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary:
Specifies the cookie handler modes that are supported.
Defines the possible values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. This property defines the kind of cookie handler that a object configures. For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode Chunked = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a chunked cookie handler; a cookie handler that is an instance of or that derives from the T:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode Custom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a custom cookie handler; a custom cookie handler that derives from the T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the default type of cookie handler is used. For the class the default is a chunked cookie handler.
